poky.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: too small and not very pleasant or comfortable
poky.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: The whole family was crammed into two poky little rooms.
poky.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: doing things very slowly, especially in a way that is annoying
poky.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: I got behind some poky driver on the freeway.
